sn35.15:4.3: Yāvatā cakkhussa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.6: Yāvatā cakkhussa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.9: Yāvatā cakkhussa nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.15:4.14: Yāvatā jivhāya assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.17: Yāvatā jivhāya ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.20: Yāvatā jivhāya nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ … pe …
sn35.15:4.23: Yāvatā manassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.26: Yāvatā manassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.15:4.29: Yāvatā manassa nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.15:5.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ … pe …
sn35.15:5.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
